mapper.update:
update credit_decision
CDS_CERT_TYPE = #{certType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CDS_CERT_NO = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CDS_CREDIT_RANK = #{creditRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CDS_CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
CDS_CREDIT_TIME = #{creditTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
CDS_CREDIT_EXPIRY_TIME = #{creditExpiryTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
CDS_CREDIT_LIMIT = #{creditLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CDS_STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
where CDS_CREDIT_NO = #{creditNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update credit_decision set CDS_CERT_TYPE = #{certType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CDS_CERT_NO = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CDS_CREDIT_RANK = #{creditRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CDS_CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, CDS_CREDIT_TIME = #{creditTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, CDS_CREDIT_EXPIRY_TIME = #{creditExpiryTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, CDS_CREDIT_LIMIT = #{creditLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CDS_STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} where CDS_CREDIT_NO = #{creditNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
